name: Mega Man II(3Ds/GB)
description:
Dr. Wily is up to no good and this time he has stolen the experimental
Time Skimmer that allows him to travel years into the future. Meanwhile,
Mega Man and his trusty side-kick, Rush, are sent on a mission to
investigate an underground lair. At arrival, the duo immediately come
face-to-face with a group of Robot Masters! Jump and blast your way
through a barrage of maniacal robotic monsters while collecting a
variety of weapons and items to help fight more Robot Masters! Who is
this stranger from the future called Quint? Can Mega Man reach Dr. Wily
before time's up? Suit up, power up, and let's go!
This game is only playable in 2D.This classic game is part of the Virtual Console service, which brings you great games created for consoles such as NES™, Super NES™ and Game Boy™ Advance. See more Virtual Console games for Nintendo 3DS.
